instance.name: smartbomb.powerup
instance.title: SMARTBOMB
instance.description: ORBITAL STRIKE. SET IT OFF WITH A CLICK IN THE MIDDLE OF THE ALIENS ADVANCING LINES.

instance.name: bezerk.powerup
instance.title: BEZERK
instance.description: GIVES 10 SECONDS OF SUPER POWER TO YOUR TURRETS AND CAPACITORS. WIPE OUT HORDES OF ALIENS IN MOMENTS!

instance.name: shield.powerup
instance.title: SUPERSHIELD
instance.description: RENDERS ALL YOUR BUILDINGS INVULNERABLE TO ATTACK FOR 10 SECONDS.

instance.name: repair.powerup
instance.title: REPAIR
instance.description: REPAIR ALL YOUR BUILDINGS TO FULL STRUCTURAL INTEGRITY.

instance.name: capacitor.powerup
instance.title: QUANTUM FLUX
instance.description: INCREASES THE RANGE OF ALL YOUR CAPACITORS. LASTS FOR THE DURATION OF THE LEVEL.

instance.name: reactor.powerup
instance.title: PLUTONIUM
instance.description: EQUIVALENT TO ADDING A REACTOR INPUT FOR ALL FACTORIES, TURRETS, AND CAPACITORS. LASTS FOR THE DURATION OF THE LEVEL.

instance.name: shieldgenerator.powerup
instance.title: STRENGTHEN
instance.description: GIVES EVERY BUILDING EXTRA SHIELDS. LASTS FOR THE DURATION OF THE LEVEL.

instance.name: radar.powerup
instance.title: RADAR
instance.description: INCREASES THE SCANNING RANGE OF EVERY TURRET. LASTS FOR THE DURATION OF THE LEVEL.

instance.name: battery.powerup
instance.title: LITHIUM IONISER
instance.description: INCREASE THE BATTERY SIZE OF EVERY TURRET. LASTS FOR THE DURATION OF THE LEVEL.

instance.name: cooling.powerup
instance.title: LIQUID NITROGEN
instance.description: BETTER COOLING ABILITY FOR EVERY TURRET. LASTS FOR THE DURATION OF THE LEVEL.
